column4: total ubuntu/linux newbie here. last night I installed ubuntu onto a flash drive, and spent today setting up e-mail, browser, etc. I realized just now that I've been doing this under the default ubuntu account, and would like to move everything to a passworded account. is there a way that I can either transfer all of my settings, or rename and password the default account?
use the default account to create the account you actually want to use. scream when that's done.
done, I'm logged into the default right now, but have already set up the one I want.
